practice_phrases.target: I want to come back at six o'clock.

practice_phrases.known: 我想认识会说英语的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who speak English.
I want to practise with someone else.

practice_phrases.known: 我想知道今天晚上会发生什么。
practice_phrases.target: I want to know what's going to happen this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 我想尽我所能地学习英语。
practice_phrases.target: I want to learn English as hard as I can.

practice_phrases.known: 我想你完成后解释一下我的意思。
practice_phrases.target: I want you to explain what I mean after you finish.
